TEXT: A Sarkaz who dared confront Laterano for the sake of a single question,a seeker willing to tread the path of suffering for an answer. NL Without anger, sorrow, blame toward heaven, or demands upon others.Andoain simply walks his own path until the very end.
"Even if the journey's end holds no reward, the act of moving forward is itself illumination. Thus shall I press onward."
